plot: The new prankster in Bart's fourth grade class actually turns out to be a mole brought in by Principal Skinner to infiltrate Bart's inner circle. Homer falls in love with his loaner car after Marge wrecks their old one.

Thanks to the kids' antics Marge prangs the car and whilst it's in for repairs the family get a state of the art new model,with which Homer is reluctant to part until he sees the old one being sold off. Bart,meanwhile,thinks he has found a kindred spirit in new class-mate Donny,who's even naughtier than him. Then he gets tipped off by Willie that Donny is a spy, brought in by Skinner to ensure prank-free school days. Bart corners Donny in an old warehouse but when Skinner and Chalmers appear to mete out the punishment Donny comes to Bart's assistance.—don @ minifie-1

Bart and Lisa's bad behaviour make Marge crash Homer's car. Whilst it's getting repaired, Homer has to drive a loaner car which he loves more than his old one, until he sees they're selling it. Bart meets a newcomer to the school, Donny, who's an even better prankster than him and he becomes his friend. Bart soon realizes that Donny is a rat sent from Chalmers and Skinner to get to Bart. When Bart tries to hurt Donny in a warehouse, Chalmers and Skinner hear him, only then does Donny become Bart's assistant.
